name: Specialty Flight Training, Inc.
about: Specialty Flight Training, Inc., located at the Boulder Municipal Airport (KBDU) in Colorado, is a renowned flight school and Cessna Pilot Center. We offer quality primary and advanced single-engine flight training, as well as comprehensive ground training. Our programs include Private Pilot Certificate and Commercial Pilot training, led by Master Flight Instructors. The school is open from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm and provides mountain flight training, ensuring students are well-prepared for various flying conditions. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Specialty Flight Training, Inc. is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals.
